about.title: About Yellow Transfer
about.subtitle: Learn about our history and the values that guide us in creating unique experiences in Brazil

story.paragraph1: Founded in 2016, Yellow Transfer was born from the passion to show the best of Brazil to the world. We started as a small family business in Rio de Janeiro, with the dream of creating authentic and memorable tourist experiences.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we expanded our services to include paradisiacal destinations like B√∫zios, Angra dos Reis and Ilha Grande, always maintaining our commitment to quality and personalization of each experience.
story.paragraph3: Today, we are recognized for our excellence in service, specialized guides and unique itineraries that show the true essence of Brazilian culture.

step2.description: We develop an exclusive itinerary focused on your preferences and available time

step3.title: Premium Execution

step4.description: Cultural immersion, local stories and unique moments that only Brazil can offer

step5.title: 24/7 Support
step5.description: We are always available to ensure your peace of mind and total satisfaction

bottom.title: Why choose our method?
bottom.description: Each step is carefully planned to ensure you have the best possible experience in Brazil, with safety, comfort and unforgettable moments.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Clear your doubts about our services in Brazil

question1.question: How does WhatsApp booking work?
question1.answer: It's very simple! Contact us via WhatsApp, tell us about your interests and available dates. We will create a personalized itinerary and send all detailed information.

question2.question: Do you personalize itineraries?
question2.answer: Yes! Each experience is unique. We consider your interests, available time and budget to create the perfect itinerary in Brazil, whether in Rio, B√∫zios, Angra or other destinations.

question3.question: Are the tours safe and punctual?
question3.answer: Absolutely! We work only with certified guides, safe vehicles and strictly follow schedules. Your safety and satisfaction are our priorities.

question4.question: Do you serve foreign tourists?
question4.answer: Yes! Our guides speak Portuguese, Spanish and English. We have experience with tourists from all over the world and adapt our services for different cultures and needs.

question5.question: What is the best time to visit?
question5.answer: Brazil is beautiful all year round! Rio has pleasant weather always, B√∫zios is perfect in summer, and Angra dos Reis offers unique experiences at any time. We help you choose the best date.

cta.title: Still have doubts?
cta.description: Our team is ready to clarify all your doubts and help you plan the perfect experience in Brazil.
